title: Worth the Risk
description: Will taking a shot at love be worth risking the friendship of a lifetime?Jessica Coleman and Rory Cooke have been best friends since they were children, but as they approach their thirtieth birthdays they realize the love they feel for each other is no longer platonic.Rory is sure that Jess is the woman for him and always has been, but he's forced to stand by and watch her date another man. What if she never works out what he has - that they're meant to be together?Jess finally recognizes Rory for who he truly is – the man she’s in love with. But she's afraid to take that leap, because if their romance ends she's not only lost her lover, but her best friend as well.Will they decide that being in love is worth the risk of losing the extraordinary friendship they already have, or will they stay just friends forever?
author: Lissanne Jones
